title: Black Beauty Archive
cleaned_text: Made and sold by [Black-owned companies](https://www.safecosmetics.org/black-beauty-project/products-2022/), these products are free of the toxic chemicals on our [Red List](https://www.safecosmetics.org/red-list/) linked to health concerns that disproportionately impact Black women. To learn more about how chemicals impact your health, [check out the Health & Science](https://www.safecosmetics.org/resources/health-science/) section. Don't see your favorite brand? [Nominate them](https://www.safecosmetics.org/black-beauty-project/nominate/). Product ingredients may have changed
